pull.title: scripts and tools: Set 'distro' explicitly
pull.body:
The [gitian-builder](https://github.com/devrandom/gitian-builder) implicitly uses `ubuntu` as a default distro.

[bin/gbuild#L237](https://github.com/devrandom/gitian-builder/blob/81edd2fc8e66193bc0e2ca8530a918eb57727139/bin/gbuild#L237):
```ruby
distro = build_desc["distro"] || "ubuntu"
```

This PR sets a gitian building distro explicitly in description files.

verification.payload:
tree 08e7e6c09effe5fdbbdc6cffe900af72944be203
parent 7fa1f6258c05648f901d7135f8b6606f60428e70
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1552587410 +0200
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1552714850 +0200

Set 'distro' explicitly

events.body:
utACK b8705a091565d4373e0e8ad4aa764cfd906708db

Explicit is better than implicit.
I think it's a bit of a pointless change as we'll very likely switch to some other way of building before gitian switches the default distro, but okay, utACK anyway
